data.title: Identity School of Acting
data.meta_description: IDSA is a leading Drama School in London and Los Angeles. Apply today to receive training from some of the industry's leading practitioners.

Audition now for September 2024 intake

Apply for your audition today and join the double award-winning part-time acting school.

Our IDSA alumni have made a significant impact on the industry, securing roles in both theatre and on screen. Join us as we applaud the accomplishments of some of our outstanding graduates.

Hollywood and IDSA Alumni – John Boyega and Letitia Wright talk on their time at Identity School of Acting and their careers

What our alumni say

"As a working professional actor, Identity is the place where I can always go back and push my craft to a new level."

Tyrant, Riviera, Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald, Victoria

"Identity Drama School helped me locate a deep sense of self, leading to a high level of not only confidence but above and beyond ambition."

Farming, Snowfall, The Commuter, Astral, City of Tiny Lights, Casualty

"Through intensive classes and hard work, I have developed vital skills for a long-lasting acting career"

Black Panther, Avengers Infinity War, Death on the Nile, Small Axe

“Identity has provided me with a stepping stone into my dream career.”

Small Axe, Star Wars Franchise, The Circle, Pacific Rim: Uprising

"The calibre of teachers and students inspire you to bring your best to every class, every set, every stage."

The Haunting of Bly Manor, Enterprise and Leopard Skin

"Training at Identity allowed me to understand and build on my craft. It has been a huge stepping stone for me and for so many others. I have learnt so much from my time there and I hope to continue to grow as an actor."

Polite Society, Bridgerton, The Bastard Son & The Devil Himself

"IDSA is a no-nonsense extremely high standard and disciplined drama school with a wonderful and supportive community."

Power Book II: GHOST, This is Us, Game of Thrones, Dark Matter

"IDSA is an invaluable experience with which I have been able to sharpen the skills I have already.”

Strike Back, Hanna, A Midsummer Night’s Dream, Now You See Me 2

"Identity was an instrumental part of my journey. I’ll always be grateful for the lessons it taught me, not only about my craft, but about myself. I can confidently look ahead, knowing how far I’ve come."

Jungle, The Batman

"The school has really pushed me and I have learnt so much about myself and gained so many new skills and tools."

The Witcher

“I learnt so much at IDSA. The school encouraged me to commit fully, take risks, and be bold. To acquire so many acting techniques by so many incredible tutors was a gift. But to also come away having made life long friends and have courage to never give up, that’s more than anything I could have hoped for."

Eastenders, How to Date Billy Walsh, Trigonometry

“IDSA gave me the training & confidence to believe in myself that I had a place in this industry. It surrounded me with so many talented like minded individuals, many of whom are smashing it and are my closest friends.”

Bohemian Rhapsody, Get Even, #No_Filter

"Every actor needs a safe place. Place where you are comfortable to be vulnerable, creative and free place where fellow actors and teachers support you and guide you to meet the best option of yourself. IDSA is such a place. I am mega thankful for this experience and the opportunity to discover my identity in the magical world of acting.”

The Undeclared War, Pure, Yuri

IDSA Actors' lounge & Netflix Hollywood Q&A

IDSA Hollywood Q&A hosts some of Hollywood’s biggest industry professionals. This exclusive Q&A series gives IDSA students key industry insights, topics and provides the space to open up a discussion with acting professionals.

Latest News

Identity School of Acting (IDSA) is the double award-winning, part-time drama school based in London, Manchester, Birmingham (UK), Los Angeles and Online. Established in 2003, IDSA has birthed ground-breaking talent, who have gone on to have dynamic careers across stage and screen.
